Title: Relates to the distribution of the additional vendor's marketing allowance by any operator of a racetrack located in the county of Westchester
Summary: Provides that the additional vendor's marketing allowance retained by any operator of a racetrack located in the county of Westchester shall not exceed 8 percent of the total revenue wagered at the vendor track after payout for prizes and the remainder of such additional vendor's marketing allowance, not to exceed 25 million dollars, shall be paid to the Yonkers city school district board of education in quarterly payments for the support and maintenance of certain educational programs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the distribution of the additional vendor's marketing allowance by any operator of a racetrack located in the county of Westchester
